github.releaseNotes: npx auto-changelog --stdout --sort-commits date-desc --commit-limit false -u --template https://raw.githubusercontent.com/release-it/release-it/master/templates/changelog-compact.hbs| grep -Eiv '\- Automated release [0-9\.]+ |Add Sonarqube tag using .* addons list|jenkins|yarn'

hooks.after:bump: npx auto-changelog --sort-commits date-desc  --commit-limit false -p; sed -i '/ Automated release [0-9\.]\+ \|Add Sonarqube tag using .* addons list\|[jJ][eE][nN][kK][iI][nN][sS]\|[yY][aA][rR][nN]/d' CHANGELOG.md
